body:
Ok, so some of you may know me, some of you may not, but this is who I am:

I joined Avicus (Mc Zone) as soon as I got minecraft which was a long, long time ago. When I first joined MC Zone I really liked nexus. It was my favorite gamemode. After some weeks of gameplay I started playing Nebula which was hard for me to understand at the time but I started liking it. I joined the forums about 2 years ago:D.


After Mc Zone update to Avicus, I started being inactive, new Avicus players joined the forums and most MC Zone peeps left. When that was in process I started making maps. I started from vanilla maps, to SPC, to WE, to MC Edit, to World Painter, to Schematic Brushes and in the meantime I am currently a world coder which makes infinite maps (for real). I am a world coder and schematic manager:D.

I'm am the build director of Avicus's main build team, Rage Inc. I have built many stuff with and without them.

Here are some of mah builds:D   Full Album  
 

(Note: I got some schematics from lord Dakr (<-----Real spelling) and the Gazamo build team:D feel free to google them up:D)
